Title: Haunter of Ruins
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Carina Adly MacKenzie, Declan De Barra, Carina Adly MacKenzie (executive story editor), Kyle Arrington (story editor), Beau DeMayo (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: After five long years apart, Klaus attempts to reconnect with his daughter, Hope. Elijah mediates a conflict between Hayley and Freya to determine the best way to protect the family.
